title: Matchsafe, "Boxing Glove", late 19th century
markings: STERLING 4372 stamped on interior of bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the shape of a right-handed boxing glove, with outline of hand incised in palm of glove, ties near wrist. Wrist area forms lid, hinged on side. Striker on curved top of glove.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Boxing Glove", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-631.
